entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
